attributes.action: Alice Dann - life saving treatment needed now!
attributes.additional_details: Allow Professor Michael Seckl to treat Alice Dann with Ipilimumab (aka Yervoy) to save her life! Mrs Dann is under the care of Prof Seckl [Director of Charing Cross/Imperial College Trophoblastic Disease Service, international leader trophoblastic disease, President of International Trophoblastic Disease Society (ISSTD.org), on founding council European Organisation for the Treatment of Trophoblastic Disease (EOTTD.com)]. To save Alice Dann's life, he applied to the Department of Health to use Ipilimumab, Monoclonal antibodies, a targeted therapy used in UK to treat advanced Melanomas and can be used to treat other cancers as part of research trials. This has been denied due to financial constraints! A unique opportunity to trial this drug + a real chance of saving a mother's and teacher's life!  This beautiful wife and mother deserves this chance!
